TopicTitle: How do I change the version?

Articles.Content:
I wanna play around with the this ship, but its for an older version and not compatible. How can I change my version. Youtube/google is not helping ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Thanks!
If your game is from ksp store a previous version is available for download there.
